description:
Tommy, a college senior, spends his spare time at the gym as well as with his women. He's a good guy who seems to get along with everyone.

When we met with him, he was instantly comfortable taking off his clothes and showing us the hard work he's done at the gym on his body. Afterwards, he invited us to a party that evening.

We all decided to go, and even though there were tons of people there, it was clear that all the ladies took notice of Tommy.
title: Tommy D
